hours_of_operation: Monday - Thursday: 7 AM to 6 PM; Friday: 7 AM to 4 PM; Saturday: 8 AM to 2 PM; Sunday: Closed
name: 647 Coffee

remote_work_features.noise_level: Moderate (based on "cozy" atmosphere and popularity with college students and groups)
remote_work_features.food_drink_options: Coffee, tea, pastries, breakfast sandwiches, quick bites, desserts. Organic dishes are also offered.
remote_work_features.parking_availability: Free parking lot and free street parking available.
